name: Bushwhacker
description:
Fill the role of the world's worst landscaper as you dash around people's lawns and chop up all the bushes in their yard with your sword! As you're very busy, you can only afford to spend a few seconds on each project; so just slice a bunch of things until you get something that looks vaguely like the picture they want, I guess. The details aren't really that important 😁

Controls:

  • Mouse: Move
  • Left Click: Slash
  • Right Click: Dash

Created by a team of 6 mostly over the course of 24 hours for the October-November game jam hosted by the University of Maryland's Game Dev Club.
